description: Sample job demonstrating logist workflow for implementing a Python utility function

history.summary: Successfully implemented the job poststep command

objective: Create a well-tested Python function that validates email addresses with comprehensive error handling and documentation

phases.name: requirements_analysis
phases.description: Analyze email validation requirements and edge cases
phases.worker_instructions: Research comprehensive email validation rules including RFC 5322 compliance, security considerations, and common edge cases. Document your findings and approach.

phases.name: implementation
phases.description: Implement the email validation function with proper error handling
phases.worker_instructions: Create a robust email_validator.py module with the following: function signature, comprehensive docstring, type hints, input validation, regex patterns, and unit tests.

phases.name: testing_and_refinement
phases.description: Test the implementation thoroughly and refine based on feedback
phases.worker_instructions: Run comprehensive tests covering normal cases, edge cases, security concerns, and performance. Fix any issues identified and improve the implementation.

success_criteria: Function passes all RFC 5322 compliant email formats
Handles security-relevant edge cases (SQL injection, XSS)
Performance optimized for reasonable input sizes

alternative_approaches: Use third-party library if regex approach proves too complex
Separate validation into multiple focused functions
Add caching for performance-critical use cases
